values.value: In the case of a personal data breach, the controller shall without undue delay and, where feasible, not later than 72 hours after having become aware of it, notify the personal data breach to the supervisory authority.
GDPR Article 33 - Notification of a personal data breach to the supervisory authority

1. Implement breach detection monitoring 2. Create incident response playbook 3. Document breach notification procedures 4. Maintain DPA contact information 5. Set up 72-hour escalation alerts 6. Train staff on breach identification 7. Template breach notification letters
